rows.label: tlk00190110_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, hello! I heard you helped build
us a school!

rows.label: tlk00190110_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, that's wonderful news. Our Martis's
been so down about not being able to
go to his Academy...

rows.label: tlk00190110_msg0003
rows.name:
We're all so proud, you know.
I even heard the mayor bragging
about "Rex, the pride of our village"!

rows.label: tlk00190110_msg0004
rows.name:
Seeing my little boy all grown up,
and with such wonderful friends...
What more could a parent ask for?
